code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import"./styles.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ChatBox=()=>{const[messages,setMessages]=useState([]);const[input,setInput]=useState("");const[mode,setMode]=useState("Code");const sendMessage=()=>{if(!input.trim())return;try{const vscode=window.acquireVsCodeApi();vscode.postMessage({command:"generateCode",prompt:input});setMessages([...messages,{text:input,sender:"user"}]);setInput("");}catch(e){console.error("Failed to send message:",e);}};useEffect(()=>{const handleMessage=event=>{if(event.data.command==="showCode"){setMessages([...messages,{text:event.data.code,sender:"bot"}]);}};window.addEventListener("message",handleMessage);return()=>window.removeEventListener("message",handleMessage);},[messages]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"full-chat-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"chat-messages",children:messages.map((msg,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:msg.sender==="user"?"user-message":"bot-message",children:msg.text},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"chat-input-bar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"input-actions",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"icon-button",children:"+"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"icon-button",children:"\uD83D\uDCF7"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Type your task here...",value:input,onChange:e=>setInput(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"send-button",onClick:sendMessage,children:"\u27A4"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mode-toggle",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"checkbox",checked:mode==="Chat",onChange:()=>setMode(mode==="Chat"?"Code":"Chat")}),"Mode: ",mode]})})]});};export default ChatBox;
